title: Mumble does not stick to locked icon on the Ubuntu Launcher
body:
When the Mumble icon is locked on to the launcher, and then launched, it will simply generate a new icon on the launcher.

This is the only application to date I have exerpienced this with.

Ubuntu 13.10 Desktop 64-bit.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1052/ .*

*The following attachments were added on the original item:
* https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1052/attachment/mumble-bugged-icons.png.png*
